purposeDescriptions.low: cleanly and gently detaches target Earth
purposeDescriptions.mid: cleaves Earth from its superstructure, leaving behind a rough seam
purposeDescriptions.high: jettisons a piece of Earth from its superstructure
purposeDescriptions.invLow: temporarily attach multiple disparate fragments of Earth
purposeDescriptions.invMid: permanently merge multiple fragments of Earth
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: combine multiple fragments of Earth into a single object, which has a homogeneous combination
